name: Skyland Architect
description:
Six months ago, the planet shattered into thousands of floating islands, thanks to a unprecedented meteor strike. People were quick to adapt though, and are now learning to live on the floating islands that remain - the Skylands. Space is at a premium, and time is of the essence to get society back on its feet.

Build beautiful (yet low-poly) floating cities in this city builder-cross-strategy-cross Tetris. Build as efficiently as possible, find the unique building interactions to buy you some extra time, and explore your creation once you are done!

How to Play

Download the ZIP, extract and run OutOfSpace.exe.

There are some interesting details in the world so I encourage players to explore the Skylands after you finish them! 

Some buildings give time bonuses when placed next to one another - I won't spoil what the combinations are - just know that you do get a notification  when you receive a bonus. 

Controls

  • WASD - Move/Pan Camera
  • Right Click + Drag - Rotate View
  • Mouse Wheel - Zoom In/Out
  • Left Click - Place Building
  • Space - Rotate Clockwise
  • Shift-Space - Rotate Counter-Clockwise
  • 1, 2, 3 Number Keys - Quick select buildings.

More Information

All code and art assets were created custom for this project.

Made using Unreal Engine 4, Asset Forge, Blender, Photoshop and Reaper (DAW).

All sound effects were from Universal Sound FX, with many of them being custom mixed/designed for this project. Music used is CC0 Creative Commons.
